item.title: Composability and Compojure
item.description: Caveat: This post needs some rudimentary knowledge of Compojure. Compojure is a web framework for Clojure, and if you don’t understand what that means, then you should probably head over to the Compojure docs. Compojure exposes us to a beautifully composable abstraction, and this post is an attempt to show why that is a great thing.
